document.full_text: at least 53 people were killed on tuesday when gunmen took hostages at a provincial council headquarters in saddam hussein's hometown, precipitating a battle with security forces who swept in to end the siege.
document.title: at least 53 dead as iraqi forces end gunmen's siege
lines_and_colors: at least 53 people were killed on tuesday when gunmen took hostages at a provincial council headquarters in saddam hussein's hometown, precipitating a battle with security forces who swept in to end the siege.
